prerequisite.name: Check for orphan planreqs
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(*)=0 FROM planreq LEFT OUTER JOIN planord ON (planord_id=planreq_source_id AND planreq_source='P') WHERE (planord_id IS NULL)
prerequisite.message: One or more orphan planned requirements records (planreq) exist without associated planned order (planord).

prerequisite.name: Check for orphan planopers
prerequisite.query: SELECT COUNT(*)=0 FROM planoper LEFT OUTER JOIN planord ON (planord_id=planoper_planord_id) WHERE (planord_id IS NULL)
prerequisite.message: One or more orphan planned operations records (planoper) exist without associated planned order (planord).
